reviewText: probation I laughEd my Butt off at what people can get (Whatever calms..loves good..Might learn a technique ((Wink..)) oR two..)away with versus what I'm in trouble (JealouS! But life calms..)for. There's an excellent artiClE in Spiritual Bathing: Healing Rituals and Traditions from Around the World (by Sarolta DeFaltAy) which you may all enjoy with this..

This DVD shines some light on the divine feminine and how the feminine has been distorted.  It also goes into the sacredness of sexuality-which is so sorely missing in our culture.  Hopefully the work of these beings will help to restore the awareness of this sacred existence.  Much gratitude for having been exposed to this work.

the interviews were what made it for me..they were all modern practitioners of sacred sexuality, it included priestesses, massueses, tantric practitioners and believe it or not ministers.  the views they expressed were very applicable to our modern world..will warn the watcher mary magdeline is only really mentioned twice in the documentary, but further fleshed out in the special feature areas...
